serverInfo.name: Firecrawl
serverInfo.description: Firecrawl makes the entire web usable for AI. It crawls any website, extracts clean text, structure, and metadata, and turns it into LLM-ready JSON. Perfect for powering search, summaries, chatbots, or data pipelines â€” without building your own crawler or scraper. Just connect, query, and get structured content back instantly.
